title: The nevv art of lying couered by Iesuites vnder the vaile of equiuocation, discouered and disproued by Henry Mason.
author: Mason, Henry, 1573?-1647.
publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill,
notes: Includes two poems in Latin, one signed by Thomas Goad, the other by Daniel Featley.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in Eton College. Library.
